705343f-a.text:
Lafayette Ave., south side, east from South Portland Ave. At the .1aft, is the Lafayette Presbyterian Church, undergoing repairs.
April 4, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
705343f-a.folder: Lafayette Avenue & Portland Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

705344f-b.text:
91 Lafayette Avenue, at the N. E. corner of South 'ortlend Avenue, shoning the only remaining house of a row of old brownstone houses. The others were renlacec by a new apartdient house.
Pow 1 October 110, 1940
P. L. Sperr  VO6w 2  N6, N59
